original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 19:37:03' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=-2 AND p.CommentCount<=18 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-21 13:50:08' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 00:53:10' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-05 18:27:51' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-11-27 03:38:45' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 19:37:03'

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -2 AND posts.CommentCount <= 18 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-21 13:50:08' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 00:53:10')
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2.Id=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-11-27 03:38:45'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E5.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-05 18:27:51'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E5E4.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes >= 0 AND users.UpVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E4E3E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2E5E4E3.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E5E4E3E6 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E5E4E3E6 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E5E4E3E6.Id)
